title: Pothole Detection in Rainy Weather
description: A real-time pothole detection system using YOLOv8 and OpenCV, trained on 1000+ annotated rainy and clear images with 90% accuracy. Enhances safety in autonomous driving under poor weather conditions.

title: Anomaly Detection in IoT Using VAE
description: Built a deep learning model using Variational Autoencoders (VAE) to detect anomalies in 8 types of IoT sensor data. Achieved 97% accuracy and improved fault detection by 40%.

title: Student Performance Prediction
description: Developed a machine learning model to predict student performance based on academic, demographic, and behavioral data using classification techniques like Decision Trees and Logistic Regression.
